author: ate
msg: JS2-774: A new maven-2 init-db plugin for initializing a portal schema for a specific database
- configuring the init-db plugin to be executable under a setup or test-setup profile

author: mmartinec
msg: URIDNSBL.pm: "querystart" field is now redundant, removed

author: aconway
msg: * qpidc.spec.in: Fix rpmlint "macro in changelog" warning.
* etc/qpidd: Put description on one line.
Continuation line causing rpmlint to barf with "wrong-line-in-lsb-tag

author: ate
msg: JS2-773: A new maven-2 ddl plugin for generating portal schema sql using ddlutils
- integrating ddl generation and packaging in the jetspeed-portal-resources project

author: cdupoirieux
msg: Inheritance of styles management - due to automatic creation of sub-style by Ooo.
Improvment of the management of Source, Fixme, Note and Warning boxes :
- Generic behaviour, every paragraph style starting with Forrest: are assililated to boxes
- Every character style starting with Forrest: are assimilated to Boxes argmument (cf. the samples of Note with a label or Fixme with an Author...)
